mapper.select: SELECT A.FBNO AS FBNO, A.FBSUBJECT AS FBSUBJECT, A.FBNAME AS FBNAME, A.FBIMG AS FBIMG, A.FBCONTENT AS FBCONTENT, A.MEMBER_MNO AS MEMBER_MNO, A.FBDELETEYN AS FBDELETEYN, A.FBINSERTDATE AS FBINSERTDATE, A.FBUPDATEDATE AS FBUPDATEDATE FROM FREEBOARD A ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD( FBNO, FBSUBJECT, FBNAME, FBIMG, FBCONTENT, MEMBER_MNO, FBDELETEYN, FBINSERTDATE, FBUPDATEDATE )VALUES( #{fbno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbsubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbimg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbcontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_mno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
